PERMIT NO.641-AA/2016
In exercise of the powers under rule 8 of the Aircrafts
Rules, 1937, The General
Manager, Field Gun Factory, Kanpur is hereby permitted to carry 0.32 Revolver or to
cause to be carried by air the arms and ammunitions
consigned to the licensed dealers
within the territory of India.
2.
The privileges of this permit shall be exercised subject to the observance
of the
following conditions:-
(i)
The
goods
are
so
packed,
protected
and
secured
as
to
avoid
the
possibility of their being a source of danger; and
(ii)
The goods are carried so as not to be accessible
to the passengers
on
board aircraft.
3.
The Field Gun Factory shall furnish to this office a quarterly
statement
of the
qocds carried under this blanket permit positively within 21 days of the completion
of a
quarter under the signature of their General Manager.
Each page of the statement is to
be authenticated
by him.
4.
This permit is valid w.e.f. 01-07-2016 to 30-06-2017.
